titleStmt.title: A poem occasioned by His Majesties most gracious resolution declar'd in His Most Honourable Privy Council, March 18, 1686/7. For liberty of conscience.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Larkin, at the Coach and Horses without Bishopsgate,

notesStmt.note: Rejoices at James' decision to recognize both Anglican and Roman Catholic Churches.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
